title: Core Competency Development Program Through Open Educational Practices (OEP) Design

context.prior_knowledge: Scientific research methodologies and basic domain-specific knowledge
context.additional_context: A course enhancing collaboration and problem-solving competencies for professionals (healthcare, legal, technical) in a BYOD environment through Open Educational Practice (OEP) design.

learning_goals: Learners can iterate open educational practice (OEP) designs at least twice using design-based research (DBR) methodology.
Learners can analyze and improve the openness level of OEP components through conjecture mapping.
Learners can develop rubrics to assess core competencies (critical thinking, collaboration, digital literacy) in open educational environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
